Articles.Content:
So I didn't know where to post this so I figured off-topic would be best but on my last post I mentioned upgrading to a gtx1050ti. The card really works great and everything also looks great but the videos i upload sort of downgraded even when i tweak it as much as i can while editing. Does anyone have any tips with shadowplay or video editing in-general or will i just have to buy sony vegas and bite the bullet?

just to give and example i'll link a video (my first space station is something i'm so proud of though lmaoooo)

 

Edited January 25, 2019 by Reinhart Mk.1

Everything looks fine to me.

I noticed on the first couple videos I uploaded, they seemed to get knocked down to lower quality when uploaded... Then I realized I was just watching them in low quality.  If you click on the gear in the bottom right, what resolution are you viewing at?
Hey thanks for the reply! Turns out it was a nvidia setting that was making everything look terrible lol. Currently editing a KSP series now that I worked out the kinks.
